title: nhaila
author: nhaila
content: ]I found 20 accounts transferring duplicate tokens.  Alt Accounts  :VihaanMiloFrancoAryanChrisLangstonJosueBenicioSpencerLaneGageLeroyColtLucianRhysOtisReignGageKareemKodyBodhiPierceLucianoStefanRileyLeandroYosefAnderLouieDominickAntonioKeithConradIraRodneyAtlasNovaLeifBenicioLouischeck their addresses and it is very clear that all of these accounts have moved QUA tokens to a secondary wallet. Then from all those sub wallets are transferred to this one main wallet :https://bscscan.com/address/0xe0942119dc50cfa595c9708c1ee8a80e9251ede0 More inquiry Result will submit here soon

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: If there are more proof which shows they are alt, then your accusation will be valid and if they abuse any bounty, only then there are something to accuse. But concluding something with only transaction must not be accepted because there are a lot of people who may buy shit token from this bounty hunters. I myself have purchased a few back in the day though I didn’t use the forum address back then but still, that doesn’t make them my alt.

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: That's a big list of alts, but alts are allowed on this forum.  Just linking a bunch of accounts to one another isn't something that deserves it's own thread.  There's already a thread for that.Plus, you're post is really lacking a lot of detail.  It would have been kind of you to use links to the account's profiles, so we don't have to search each one.  It would also be nice of you to link the address used by each account, also for the convenience of your audience.  But most importantly; what have they done wrong, are they cheating a bounty or something?

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: nhaila on July 09, 2022, 05:58:44 PMcheck their addresses and it is very clear that all of these accounts have moved QUA tokens to a secondary wallet. Then from all those sub wallets are transferred to this one main wallet :https://bscscan.com/address/0xe0942119dc50cfa595c9708c1ee8a80e9251ede0Show us how the accounts are connected. Listing them down here isn't enough. We need POA, the addresses or social media handles. You should leave work half done.It would also be much better if there was more than one incident where the accounts showed a similar pattern, proving the accounts are connected.

comments.author: BITCOIN4X
comments.body: OP, complete more valid proof of each account you accuse before you create a thread, it's much more advisable than you having people ask how it's connected.My advice is to close this thread and come back after you have completed a valid proof. This is really a great find, it will definitely take a lot of time to reveal more proof.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: BITCOIN4X on July 09, 2022, 06:33:58 PMOP, complete more valid proof of each account you accuse before you create a thread, it's much more advisable than you having people ask how it's connected.Yeah, I'd say linking all those accounts might prove to be of some value if they have or ever engage in something scammy (like bounty abuse, most likely).  But I'm not seeing where any of those members have cheated or anything like that, and I'm not sure publicly announcing the connection is going to do any good without some kind of smoking gun.But man, if one person controls all those accounts--or even if it's a few people--I'd be willing to bet there's some sort of shenanigans somewhere.  Nobody collects that many accounts because they like to display them on their trophy shelf, ya know?

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: The Pharmacist on July 10, 2022, 02:07:39 AMBut man, if one person controls all those accounts--or even if it's a few people--I'd be willing to bet there's some sort of shenanigans somewhere.  Nobody collects that many accounts because they like to display them on their trophy shelf, ya know?This is the work of a bot machine. Registrations were made in one or two days. But I wouldn't be surprised that there are other accounts like this.Registration in the bounty also occurs by machine, you can track it by the time the account was created and the time of registration in the bounty.There are many more bot accounts than the OP found. They have slightly different actions, but still, they give themselves out very noticeably.I will mark them all as cheaters.1.JosueBenicio    December 18, 2021, 02:48:24 PM2.EmmittCase    December 18, comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: nhaila on July 09, 2022, 05:58:44 PMcheck their addresses and it is very clear that all of these accounts have moved QUA tokens to a secondary wallet. Then from all those sub wallets are transferred to this one main wallet :https://bscscan.com/address/0xe0942119dc50cfa595c9708c1ee8a80e9251ede0I tried to take a quick look at the data and address provided by: @nhaila, it seems that the address has been published by: @Awaklara, in his investigationFor example this address: 0x0E47F8bE9fB2535E4CfB3b3324270DA1b5d3fC11Which I see in TX: which @nhaila meant.Proof:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2544574.msg58523466#msg58523466QuoteMiscellaneous:Wallet Addres >> 0x0E47F8bE9fB2535E4CfB3b3324270DA1b5d3fC11txns : https://bscscan.com/address/0x0e47f8be9fb2535e4cfb3b3324270da1b5d3fc11#tokentxnsIndeed, I see at first glance they are cheating in the campaign, but I don't know why @Awaklara, didn't give them a (red) label.Maybe, if @nhaila try to take a little time and check carefully, he didn't bother to make this thread, he can see from the data published by: @Awaklara.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: YOSHIE on July 10, 2022, 01:04:07 PM tried to take a quick look at the data and address provided by: @nhaila, Maybe you should take a closer look and check that there is not a single account that submitted the OP with what @Awaklara caught?? Although I will not argue that those accounts belong to these bots, but, frankly, I do not see any coincidence.And also I assume that those accounts have nothing in common, except that they transfer tokens to the same wallet. And this, as we know, is not prohibited. There are many telegram groups where people throw tokens into one basket. Probably because of this, these accounts were not marked.

comments.author: Awaklara
comments.created_time: July 10, 2022, 03:02:02 PMLast edit: July 10, 2022, 03:21:52 PM by Awaklara
comments.body: Based on the link you mentioned. I didn't miss the (red) label because they proved to be connected to each other.Quote from: YOSHIE on July 10, 2022, 01:04:07 PMhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2544574.msg58523466#msg58523466QuoteMiscellaneous:Wallet Addres >> 0x0E47F8bE9fB2535E4CfB3b3324270DA1b5d3fC11txns : https://bscscan.com/address/0x0e47f8be9fb2535e4cfb3b3324270da1b5d3fc11#tokentxnsIndeed, I see at first glance they are cheating in the campaign, but I don't know why @Awaklara, didn't give them a (red) label.Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on July 10, 2022, 01:28:25 PMAnd also I assume that those accounts have nothing in common, except that they transfer tokens to the same wallet. And this, as we know, is not prohibited.Actually the pattern doesn't change i.e. they create new accounts, but they leave traces of transactions as mentioned by @YOSHIEhttps://bscscan.com/tx/0x8871623524303c29407f2385b8aa966195c6ab9e53cc07e4b2b263394e5c9e1c (168 days) Address : 0x0e47f8be9fb2535e4cfb3b3324270da1b5d3fc11Address : 0xd72e56e5b0f951b36decd216130ed5f525d8e2faQuote from: lovesmayfamilis on July 10, 2022, 01:28:25 PMAnd this, as we know, is not prohibited. There are many telegram groups where people throw tokens into one basket. Probably because of this, these accounts were not marked.Yes, they don't collect tokens into one basket but they sell tokens and convert them into BUSD/BSC before dumping them here: 0xd72e56e5b0f951b36decd216130ed5f525d8e2fahttps://bscscan.com/tx/0xfad15f9a170d2f96ba1289d604f91f58eb06b9778ce805ef9d469d00eccb6a2f (147 days)Address : 0xe0942119dc50cfa595c9708c1ee8a80e9251ede0Address : 0xd72e56e5b0f951b36decd216130ed5f525d8e2faAlso, not a coincidence like your investigation, overall the account was registered on December 18, 2021 and while my investigation was in November 13, 2021 + November 24, 2021And based investigation by Stalker22 also connected to each other.Quote@shophuongbay, can you explain your connection to these accounts?Accounts Connected1. shophuongbay - 0xa2043b465c74Dea471a0D080D4aC35f0ECFCEC762. lehien2018 3. Jenakaylin  -      0xa2043b465c74Dea471a0D080D4aC35f0ECFCEC76https://bscscan.com/tx/0x18b79677b00f43d9a38d29f5e3e78b05dcce29ce47f60dcebb4bf2df09728771Address : 0xa2043b465c74Dea471a0D080D4aC35f0ECFCEC76Address : 0xd72e56e5b0f951b36decd216130ed5f525d8e2fa

comments.body: Quote from: lovesmayfamilis on July 10, 2022, 12:01:41 PMQuote from: The Pharmacist on July 10, 2022, 02:07:39 AMBut man, if one person controls all those accounts--or even if it's a few people--I'd be willing to bet there's some sort of shenanigans somewhere.  Nobody collects that many accounts because they like to display them on their trophy shelf, ya know?This is the work of a bot machine. Registrations were made in one or two days. But I wouldn't be surprised that there are other accounts like this.Registration in the bounty also occurs by machine, you can track it by the time the account was created and the time of registration in the bounty.There are many more bot accounts than the OP found. comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: jesscry on September 23, 2022, 09:46:12 AMSorry to bother you, but I'm new and I don't know how to post proofs on the forum. I realized that they were accessing the same time and posting the POA at the same time.I can understand that, we were all new to the forum once. In that case, I suggest you look at how other members do it and copy their way of presenting evidence. That's the best way to learn and, in my opinion, the best way to become a good investigator.

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: Quote from: jesscry on September 23, 2022, 09:46:12 AMSorry to bother you, but I'm new and I don't know how to post proofs on the forum. your account was registered almost 2 years ago. you're just luring other investigators to do it for you.for once or twice I think it doesn't matter. but you can already see examples of how they present evidence. of course, you can do it even if you have to copy the writing format.you could spend more time studying this. it doesn't matter if you want to continue.
